texts.biography: The position of watchman assured Ehecat knowledge about the importance of the paradise where the bird people live. Hard to imagine leadership in a chaotic people, but in the midst of so much chaos a little knowledge is enough.
texts.name: Ehecat

specialty.description: Increases attack, defense and damage of any Bird Hunters by 1 every 2 levels.
specialty.name: Bird Stalker
specialty.tooltip: Increases attack, defense and damage of any Bird Hunters by 1 every 2 levels.
